problem_text_cn: 如图,铁路道口的栏杆短臂长1m,长臂长16m．当短臂端点下降0.5m时,长臂端点升高(杆的宽度忽略不计)()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the short arm length of the railroad crossing is N_0 and the long arm length is N_1. When the end of the short arm drops by N_2, the end of the long arm rises (the width of the rod is ignored) ()
raw_answer: 解:设长臂端点升高x米,则\frac{0.5}{x}=\frac{1}{16},∴解得:x=8．故选:C．
raw_comment: 此题考查了相似三角形在实际生活中的运用,得出比例关系式是解题关键．
